entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
